You’ve take a table at the corner."/pause 500/question fork0 "What should we do?#Let’s get some drinks.#Do you want to play arcade?"/fork AbigailDateArcade/pause 500/speak Abigail "You want to play arcade? Entries.AbigailDateEnd: speak Abigail "Is that? That’s all? Why are you even asked me for this date!"/message "She looks really disappointed."/friendship Abigail -100/friendship AbigailLewd 0/end warpOut
Entries.AbigailDateArcade: speak Abigail "Em, I don’t want to, but you can order to yourself, if you want."/pause 500/message "You ordered a drink to yourself, you talked all evening, but it seems that Abigail wasn’t impressed."/friendship Abigail 100/friendship AbigailLewd 0/end warpOut
Entries.AbigailDateEnough: message "That’s enough and she seems really excited by this date, So you walked her home, and went to bed."/friendship Abigail 100/friendship AbigailLewd 25/end warpOut
